description:
Subsidies (enterprises with a turnover from EUR 250 000)

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
47415 Structural survey of service activities

Definition:
Subsidies are current and unrequited financial contributions
made by general government (Federation, the Länder and
municipalities) or the institutions of the European Union to
the survey unit for research and development projects or for
current business operations.

name: Subsidies(enterprises w.turnover from EUR 250 000)
